text:
A 35-year-old woman train passenger was allegedly raped on Tuesday night by three persons near Itarsi railway station, Government Railway Police said.

The three accused — Laxman Ahirwar (28), Mohammad Azhar (24) and Chotu Patel (28) — were arrested. Police said the woman had been travelling with a relative and had boarded a wrong train at Nagpur on her journey home. — PTI
title: Woman raped, three held in M.P.
